About.title: About Me
About.sobre: I am a developer with 1 year of practical experience in the area, currently acting as an intern and developing real solutions for the market. I am studying Systems Analysis and Development at Universidade Paulista â€“ Campus Manaus.I have experience with the main technologies of the web and mobile ecosystem, including React Native, React, Node.js, SQL, MongoDB, Next.js and TypeScript. I am driven by challenges and passionate about learning and creating solutions that make a difference.

Project1.title: My Portfolio
Project1.description: This is my personal website, the one you are currently viewing :). Developed with React, Tailwind, APIs.

Project2.title: Restaurant Management
Project2.description: This is a restaurant management and customer service system project, called HEST. Developed with React, Node, Tailwind, MySQL.

Project3.title: Authentication and User Profile System
Project3.description: I developed a full-stack system for user management using Next.js, React, MongoDB, and Prisma. The application allows users to register, authenticate, and view their profile securely and efficiently. The solution implements JWT-based authentication, NoSQL database interaction (MongoDB), and a responsive interface with React. Techs: Next.js, React, Prisma, MongoDB.

Project4.title: Blog Viewreo
Project4.description: I developed a full-stack blog using Next.js, MongoDB, NextAuth, and Prisma. The application allows users to securely authenticate, create and view posts, as well as interact with the content. The solution implements authentication with NextAuth, data storage and management using MongoDB and Prisma, ensuring a smooth and secure experience. The interface is built with React, being responsive and optimized for all devices. Techs: Next.js, React, MongoDB, NextAuth, Prisma.
